sentences: This issue was first addressed by SBI in plenary on Friday, 20 May.
The Secretariats opening remarks focused on the funding shortfall due to outstanding contributions from Parties.
SBI Chair Becker said he would consult informally with Parties and prepare draft conclusions.
In the SBI plenary on Thursday, 26 May, Parties adopted the conclusions without comment.
enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
